summary: Diff adds a web manifest and links it from index.html, adds iOS/PWA meta tags and a service worker with registration, and implements an in-app install prompt banner with dismissal persistence. However, the required generated image assets themselves are not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated in the diff summary, so the image-asset requirement cannot be verified as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required generated image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames, and ensure the app references them as static files (including cover image references used by frontend/src/lib/covers.ts resolving at runtime).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows references to /assets/generated/*.png in the manifest, index.html, and service worker pre-cache list, but does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated. Also, no change is shown for frontend/src/lib/covers.ts to confirm runtime cover references resolve correctly.

hallucinated_features.description: Service worker registration includes a periodic update check (registration.update()) every minute.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-22 asks for service worker registration and offline-first caching behavior, but does not request periodic update polling.
